forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 4pm. Mostly sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 42. North northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning unfurls in Downtown San Francisco, a delicate tenderness hangs in the air, a remnant of last night's embrace. The streets whisper with the promise of sporadic drizzle, giving way to pockets of sunshine that will peek through polite clouds, teasing a high around 55. Yet, as the day progresses, temperatures will gently descend, inviting a chill that lingers. A light breeze sweeps through, with whispers from the northwest at a leisurely pace, moving along with the subtle dance of fog that often graces this city.

The coastal marine layer, ever present, caresses the edges of the Golden Gate, creating a soft veil over the water, while the skyline stands boldly against the backdrop of a changing canvas. You'll want to don layers—perhaps a light jacket to offset the coolness, complemented by a scarf to ward off the briskness of the afternoon. As the sun sets tonight, a clear sky will emerge, revealing a serene palette of twilight hues, ideal for a contemplative stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet moment in one of the countless cafes, where the soft hum of conversation carries the day to a gentle close.
